member.name: T:Acontplus.Reports.Configuration.ReportOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for report generation services

member.name: P:Acontplus.Reports.Configuration.ReportOptions.MainDirectory
member.summary: Main directory where RDLC report files are stored

member.name: P:Acontplus.Reports.Configuration.ReportOptions.ExternalDirectory
member.summary: External directory for offline or external reports

member.name: P:Acontplus.Reports.Configuration.ReportOptions.MaxReportSizeBytes
member.summary: Maximum size in bytes for a single report output (default 100MB)

member.name: P:Acontplus.Reports.Configuration.ReportOptions.ReportGenerationTimeoutSeconds
member.summary: Timeout for report generation in seconds (default 300 seconds / 5 minutes)

member.name: P:Acontplus.Reports.Configuration.ReportOptions.EnableReportDefinitionCache
member.summary: Enable caching of report definitions (default true)

member.name: P:Acontplus.Reports.Configuration.ReportOptions.MaxCachedReportDefinitions
member.summary: Maximum number of cached report definitions (default 100)

member.name: P:Acontplus.Reports.Configuration.ReportOptions.CacheTtlMinutes
member.summary: Time-to-live for cached report definitions in minutes (default 60 minutes)

member.name: P:Acontplus.Reports.Configuration.ReportOptions.EnableMemoryPooling
member.summary: Enable memory pooling for better performance (default true)

member.name: P:Acontplus.Reports.Configuration.ReportOptions.MaxConcurrentReports
member.summary: Maximum number of concurrent report generation tasks. Default: 10

member.name: P:Acontplus.Reports.Configuration.ReportOptions.MaxConcurrentPrintJobs
member.summary: Maximum number of concurrent print jobs. Default: 5 (printing is slower than generation)

member.name: P:Acontplus.Reports.Configuration.ReportOptions.PrintJobTimeoutSeconds
member.summary: Timeout for print jobs in seconds. Default: 180 (3 minutes)

member.name: P:Acontplus.Reports.Configuration.ReportOptions.EnableDetailedLogging
member.summary: Enable detailed logging for report operations (default false)

member.name: T:Acontplus.Reports.Exceptions.ReportGenerationException
member.summary: Exception thrown when report generation fails

member.name: T:Acontplus.Reports.Exceptions.ReportSizeExceededException
member.summary: Exception thrown when report size exceeds maximum allowed

member.name: T:Acontplus.Reports.Exceptions.ReportTimeoutException
member.summary: Exception thrown when report generation times out

member.name: T:Acontplus.Reports.Exceptions.ReportNotFoundException
member.summary: Exception thrown when report file is not found

member.name: T:Acontplus.Reports.Extensions.ServiceCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for registering report services in the dependency injection container

member.summary: Adds report generation services to the service collection

member.name: M:Acontplus.Reports.Extensions.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddReportServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{Acontplus.Reports.Configuration.ReportOptions})
member.summary: Adds report generation services with custom configuration

member.summary: Prints a report asynchronously with support for cancellation and timeout

member.name: T:Acontplus.Reports.Interfaces.IRdlcReportService
member.summary: Service for generating RDLC reports with support for multiple formats and data sources

member.summary: Generates a report asynchronously from the provided parameters and data
member.param: DataSet containing report parameters, data sources configuration, and report properties
DataSet containing the actual data for the report
Whether to use external directory for report files
Cancellation token to cancel the operation
member.returns: ReportResponse containing the generated report content

member.summary: Gets a default error report (typically a "Not Found" PDF)

member.summary: Legacy synchronous method - prefer using GetReportAsync for better performance
